skills.title: Skills
content: Experience with Software Architecture, including MVC, Microservices, Layered and others, and deploys on both FTP and Cloud Services
6 years experience with HTML + CSS + jQuery
5 years experience with React + Next
3 years experience with Node + Express, 1 year with Nest
2 years experience with Sequelize, 1 with Prisma
7 years experience with MySQL
6 years experience with Java, 1 with Spring
2 years experience with PHP, including CakePHP and Laravel
1 year experience with Wordpress and Wordpress plugins, including WooCommerce
Extensive knowledge in general purpose languages such as C, Java, JavaScript and Python
Experience with Machine Learning and Data Mining using scikit-learn and pandas
Experience with Web Scraping using Scrapy
2 years experience with Docker
Experience with Kubernetes
3 years experience with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, Argo CD and GitOps
1 year experience with React Native
Experience with Java and Kotlin for Android, including AOSP
8 years experience with Adobe CC tools, such as Illustrator, Photoshop, Lightroom and others
4 years experience with UI/UX design, including tools such as Figma
Experience with agile methodologies
